resources.string:
Hi this me, m3c!!

 I am nobody but trying to be somebody. This is nothing but my resolve.

 Who wants to be a burden in the society?? 
The answer is no body.

 So try to be somebody in the life who can do at least something.

 There is no place for coward.
 Be brave and come out.
 This is your life.
 Live to the fullest.
 Obviously in the hala way.
 Because in the end only Allah matters.
 And through Allah one can get the true happiness.
 So, build a good relationship with Allah.
 Hope you will get succeeded.
